nodes.text: Goure Conor was a male Ryn who was staying on Bakura. He greeted the Solo family upon their arrival, and became a friend to Tahiri Veila.
He was part of a vast Ryn communication network, and directed the Solos to Onadax, where a contact was reportedly awaiting, after the Ssi-ruuk Consecration Ceremony had been ended abruptly.
